MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.40am to repair a fault on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.14am on Thursday 10th December 2020.
